      • addGroupMembers

        Optional<Integer> addGroupMembers(String group,
                                  Collection<String> members)
        Enters a request in the Administration Requests database to add members to a new or existing a group.
        Parameters:
        group - The name of the group
        members - The name of the group
        Returns:
        The note ID of an entry created in the Administration Requests database

      • changeHTTPPassword

        Optional<Integer> changeHTTPPassword(String username,
                                     String oldpassword,
                                     String newpassword)
        Enters a request in the Administration Requests database to change a user's Internet password.
        Parameters:
        username - The full hierarchical name (can be abbreviated) of the user.
        oldpassword - The existing password
        newpassword - The new password
        Returns:
        note id The note ID of an entry created in the Administration Requests database

      • renameGroup

        int renameGroup(String group,
                String newgroup)
        Enters a request in the Administration Requests database to rename a group.
        Parameters:
        group - The name of the group.
        newgroup - The new name of the group.
        Returns:
        The note ID of an entry created in the Administration Requests database.

      • addServerToCluster

        int addServerToCluster(String server,
                       String cluster)
        Enters a request in the Administration Requests database to add a server to a cluster.
        Parameters:
        server - The full hierarchical name (can be abbreviated) of the server.
        cluster - The name of the cluster.
        Returns:
        The note ID of an entry created in the Administration Requests database.

      • removeServerFromCluster

        int removeServerFromCluster(String server)
        Enters a request in the Administration Requests database to remove a server from a cluster.
        Parameters:
        server - The name of the server.
        Returns:
        The note ID of an entry created in the Administration Requests database.
